## osp stats show

Show repository statistics

### Synopsis

Show basic statistics for a repository, including stars, forks, issues, etc.

```
osp stats show [owner/repo] [flags]
```

### Options

```
      --format string   Output format (text, json) (default "text")
  -h, --help            help for show
```
